short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The OnPage Editor lets you easily review and edit translations directly on your website, in context.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After installing the plugin, sign in using your GlobalLink GO account and then navigate to the website associated with the account.
Select one of your projectâ€™s languages in the OnPage Editor and click on any text segment on the page to view the original and translated text side-by-side.
You can modify the translated text to something different and save your changes, which will be stored in a translation memory.
Note that this extension will only work on the domain associated with your GlobalLink GO account.
